alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:01AM MST until December 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The lower Snake River plain and the eastern Magic Valley, including the cities of Shelley, Blackfoot, Fort Hall, Pocatello, American Falls, Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, and Oakley. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Drifting snow can overcome snow clearance efforts, causing temporary road and highway closures. Check road conditions and dress appropriately if you are headed out for First Night or New Year`s Eve events.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain
